title: Funerary epitaph for Publicia Euplea
support: Large slab of grey stone. Top is intact with fine moulding. Sides and bottom are broken. Top is rounded, and back is flat.

dimensions._: 11 (at top, with moulding), 9 (at bottom, without moulding)

layout.p: Four lines of complete Latin text. L1 is centered within the stone, whereas lines 2-4 lean towards the right. Interpuncts are inconsistent.

handNote.lettering: Text is has been shakily inscribed onto stone. Letters are well defined, but shapes and sizes are irregular and inconsistent. Serifs are used. Middle 'I' in XII line 4 is tall, stretching above other digits forming a supraline

provenanceFound._: Found in Termini Imerese outside the porta di Caccamo (= Porta di Girgenti), south of the city, during excavation for the installation of water pipes.

provenanceObserved._: Antoniou, 2023-07-05. In the Depositi of Museo Civico Baldassare Romano, room 1, scaffold 8, shelf 4

facsimile.desc: I.Sicily with the permission of the Assessorato Regionale dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana - Dipartimento dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana
